ovdesc.p: This table updated with fields required for CBR extract by the service CBR.UPDATE.DETAILS
@ID - The ID will be a valid AA account number

desc.p: This field updated with the AA customer ID which is called base customer reference number for selected arrangement records.
This field updated with base or primary customer's family from the field FAMILY.NAME.
This field updated with base or primary customer's first name from the field GIVEN.NAME.
This field updated with base or primary customer's middle name from the field MIDDLE.NAME.
This field updated with base or primary customer's suffix title from the field SUFFIX.
This field updated with base or primary customer's social security number from the field TAX.ID
This field updated with base or primary customer's Date.of.Birth
This field updated with base or primary customer's telephone number from the field PHONE.
This field updated with base or primary customer's relation code.
Contains a value that indicates a special condition of the account that applies to the primary consumer.
This field updated with base or primary customer's country code from the field COUNTRY.
This field updated with base or primary customer's first line address from the field NAME.2.
This field updated with base or primary customer's second line address from the field STREET.
This field updated with base or primary customer's city from the field TOWN.COUNTRY
This field updated with base or primary customer's state from the field state.
This field updated with base or primary customer's postal / zip code from the field This field updated with base or primary customer's .
This will be the blank field.
The field updates with relative customer for the base customer extracted from the AA OWNER field.
this is a associated set fields updated with the joint customer details who located in same address of base customer
This field updated with joint customer's family name from the field FAMILY.NAME.
This field updated with joint customer's first name from the field GIVEN.NAME.
This field updated with joint customer's middle name from the field MIDDLE.NAME.
This field updated with joint customer's suffix title from the field SUFFIX.
This field updated with joint customer's social security number from the field TAX.ID
This field updated with joint customer's Date.of.Birth
This field updated with joint customer's telephone number from the field PHONE.
This field updated with joint customer's relation code.
Contains a value that indicates a special condition of the account that applies to the primary consumer.
The field updates with relative customer for the base customer extracted from the AA OWNER field.
this is a associated set fields updated with the joint customer details who located in different address of base customer
This field updated with joint customer's family from the field FAMILY.NAME.
This field updated with joint customer's first name from the field GIVEN.NAME.
This field updated with joint customer's middle name from the field MIDDLE.NAME.
This field updated with joint customer's suffix title from the field SUFFIX.
This field updated with joint customer's social security number from the field TAX.ID
This field updated with joint customer's Date.of.Birth
This field updated with joint customer's telephone number from the field PHONE.
This field updated with joint customer's relation code.
Contains a value that indicates a special condition of the account that applies to the primary consumer.
This field updated with joint customer's country code from the field COUNTRY.
This field updated with joint first line address from the field NAME.2.
Update the address of joint customer.
Update the city of joint customer.
Update the state of joint customer from the field US.STATE.
Update the postal code of joint customer form the field POST.CODE.
